TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit FormattedText extends System.Object

summary.span: 为 Windows Presentation Foundation (WPF) 应用程序中的绘图文本提供低级别的控制。

span.span: Provides low-level control for drawing text in Windows Presentation Foundation (WPF) applications.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 对象可绘制多行文本，在其中的文本中的每个字符可以单独设置格式。The object allows you to draw multi-line text, in which each character in the text can be individually formatted. 下例演示应用了多种格式的文本。The following example shows text that has several formats applied to it. ![使用 FormattedText 对象显示的文本](~/add/media/formattedtext01.jpg "使用 FormattedText 对象显示的文本")![Text displayed using FormattedText object](~/add/media/formattedtext01.jpg "Text displayed using FormattedText object") 带格式的文本字符串的示例Example of a formatted text string 在文本中的功能方面[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)]，被视为"低级"，因为它作为图形元素处理文本。In terms of text features in [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)], is considered "low-level" because it processes text as graphical elements. 中的文本的其他方面[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)]处理专用于文本的控件的上下文中的文本 (， )，实现流文档模型 (请参阅[流文档概述](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/flow-document-overview.md))，或支持[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xps](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xps-md.md)]文档模型 (请参阅[WPF 中的文档](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/documents-in-wpf.md))。Other aspects of text in [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] handle text in the context of controls that are dedicated to text (, ), implement the flow document model (see [Flow Document Overview](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/flow-document-overview.md)), or support the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xps](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xps-md.md)] document model (see [Documents in WPF](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/documents-in-wpf.md)). 中的 setter 方法的许多具有受支持的附加属性的相似之处，但附加的属性应用于更高级别的文本支持为流或[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xps](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xps-md.md)]。Many of the setter methods in have similarities to attached properties that are supported by , but the attached properties apply to the higher-level text support either for flow or [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xps](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xps-md.md)]. ## Examples 下面的示例创建对象，然后向文本应用多种格式化样式。The following example creates a object and then applies several formatting styles to the text. [!code-csharp[FormattedTextSnippets#FormattedTextSnippets1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/FormattedTextSnippets/CSharp/Window1.xaml.cs#formattedtextsnippets1)] [!code-vb[FormattedTextSnippets#FormattedTextSnippets1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/FormattedTextSnippets/visualbasic/window1.xaml.vb#formattedtextsnippets1)]

summary.span: 返回一个 对象，该对象表示格式化文本，包括所有标志符号和文本修饰。

span.span: Returns a object that represents the formatted text, including all glyphs and text decorations.

returns.span: 格式化文本的 对象表示形式。

span.span: The object representation of the formatted text.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当文本转换为对象，它不再是一系列字符-不能修改文本字符串中的字符。When text is converted to a object, it is no longer a collection of characters - you cannot modify the characters in the text string. 但是，可修改已转换文本的笔划和填充属性，以此来影响该文本的外观。However, you can affect the appearance of the converted text by modifying its stroke and fill properties. 下面的示例演示了多种方法可以通过修改的笔划和填充的已转换的文本来创建视觉效果。The following examples illustrate several ways of creating visual effects by modifying the stroke and fill of converted text. ![对填充和笔画使用不同颜色的文本](~/add/media/outlinedtext03.jpg "对填充和笔画使用不同颜色的文本")![Text with different colors for fill and stroke](~/add/media/outlinedtext03.jpg "Text with different colors for fill and stroke") 将笔划和填充设置为不同颜色的示例Example of setting stroke and fill to different colors ![笔划应用了图像画笔的文本](~/add/media/outlinedtext04.jpg "笔划应用了图像画笔的文本")![Text with image brush applied to stroke](~/add/media/outlinedtext04.jpg "Text with image brush applied to stroke") 笔划应用了图像画笔的示例Example of an image brush applied to the stroke 文本转换为，并呈现为对象可能不会被视为直接呈现文本：Text that is converted to and rendered as a object may not look the same as text rendered directly: - 文本转换为不使用 ClearType 呈现对象。Text converted to a object is not rendered using ClearType. 此外，已转换文本基线不与整个显示像素对齐。In addition, the baseline of the converted is not snapped to a whole display pixel. - 小字体，例如那些通常用于正文文本，可能会丢失以增强可读性、 显示经过模糊处理，和在外观上有所不同。Small fonts, such as those commonly used in body text, may lose legibility, appear blurred, and vary in appearance. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何创建对象以及如何检索几何图形的带格式的文本和其边界框。The following example shows how to create a object and to retrieve the geometries of the formatted text and its bounding box. [!code-csharp[OutlineTextControlViewer#CreateText](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/OutlineTextControlViewer/CSharp/OutlineTextControl.cs#createtext)] [!code-vb[OutlineTextControlViewer#CreateText](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/OutlineTextControlViewer/visualbasic/outlinetextcontrol.vb#createtext)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 文本会换行，以避免超过限制。Text will wrap to avoid exceeding the limit. 标志符号对齐边缘必须保持的行计数限制范围内。Glyph alignment edges must be kept within the line count limits. 由于许多字体包含略微延伸出它们的对齐边缘的标志符号，允许至少 1/6 em （字体大小） 边距超出了行计数请求，以留出此类的延伸量。Because many fonts contain glyphs that slightly overhang their alignment edges, allow at least 1/6 em (font size) margin beyond the line count requested, to leave room for such overhangs. 行计数的零值视为无限行计数。A zero value for line count is treated as an infinite line count. ## Examples 下面的示例创建对象，然后向文本应用多种格式化样式包括。The following example creates a object and then applies several formatting styles to the text, including . remarks.format: ## Remarks 类指定要应用于文本的文本修饰的类型。The class specifies the types of text decorations to apply to the text. 有四种类型的文本修饰： 下划线、 基线、 删除线和上划线。There are four types of text decorations: underline, baseline, strikethrough, and overline. 这些被称为中的每一项上设置的值。These are described as values that are set on each item in the . 通常，集合只包含一个修饰，但该属性使用集合提供更高级的修饰效果的通过将多个效果应用于相同的文本。It is common that the collection contains only one decoration, but the property uses the collection to provide for more advanced decoration effects by applying multiple decorations to the same text. 下图显示了文本修饰相对于文本的位置。The following illustration shows the locations of the text decorations relative to the text. ![文本修饰位置示意图](~/add/media/textdecoration01.gif "文本修饰位置示意图")![Diagram of text decoration locations](~/add/media/textdecoration01.gif "Diagram of text decoration locations") 文本修饰类型的示例Example of text decoration types 此方法设置整个文本字符串。This method sets the for the entire text string. 若要设置文本字符串的子集，使用方法。To set the for a subset of the text string, use the method.
